DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study assess single-dose pharmacokinetics intravenously-administered MNTX healthy adult male female subject absence , presence , orally-administered cimetidine .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Cimetidine Single-Dose PK IV- Administered MNTX
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female age 18 45 2 . Subjects nonsmokers 3 . Subjects body weight range 154220 lb . 1 . Females pregnant lactate 2 . Subjects history clinically significant disease condition affect major organ system 3 . Subjects ECG abnormalities 4 . Subjects test positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C HIV 5 . Subjects diagnosis alcohol substance dependence past 12 month 6 . Subjects positive urine result drug abuse .
